body: So the reason matheo is an outcast is because they wanted him and the priest to get together so they could have his semen which helped the crops grow and helped on the reproduction of the population (idk how they are using the semen tho) and as time passed even tho the priest was meant to be living for the village,he fell in love with matheo which is why the priest says he wants to live for matheo
